arrangements 1.0.3

    • Benchmarking 'arrangements'

    Benchmarking ‘arrangements’

    benchmark.Rmd

    The goal of this document is to compare the performances of some of the existing packages for generating combinations, permutations and partitions.

    • gtools 3.8.1
    • combinat 0.0-8
    • multicool 0.1-10
    • partitions 1.9-19
    • permute 0.9-4
    • permutations 1.0-2
    • RcppAlgos 2.0.3
    • iterpc: it is omitted as arrangements is thought of a replacement of iterpc.
    library(microbenchmark)
library(gtools)
library(combinat)
library(multicool)
library(partitions)
library(permute)
library(permutations)
library(RcppAlgos)
library(arrangements)
gtools.permutations <- gtools::permutations
gtools.combinations <- gtools::combinations
utils.combn <- utils::combn

    gtools::permutations, gtools::combinations and utils::combn are renamed because they are being overwritten by arrangements::permutations, arrangements::combinations and combinat::combn respectively.

    Permutations

    Permutations of 6 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(6, 6),
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(1:6)),
    partitions = partitions::perms(6),
    permuate = allPerms(6),
    permutations = allperms(6),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(6, 6),
    arrangements = permutations(6),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq     max neval
##        gtools  523.38  314.56  244.55  233.99  237.03  68.374   100
##     multicool  250.88  156.67  117.22  114.74  106.92  26.307   100
##    partitions    2.32    2.32    1.89    1.88    1.92   0.549   100
##      permuate  903.49  553.10  412.88  416.98  392.90  77.870   100
##  permutations 2485.08 1594.98 1129.98 1167.03 1030.62 321.350   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.19    1.42    1.90    1.19    1.16  10.617   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00    1.00   1.000   100

    5-Permutations of 7 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.permutations(7, 5),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(7, 5),
    arrangements = permutations(7, 5),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median     uq    max neval
##        gtools 247.87 222.21 164.91  177.9 152.24 132.81   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.06   1.34   1.18    1.1   1.14   1.22   100
##  arrangements   1.00   1.00   1.00    1.0   1.00   1.00   100

    Permutations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min     lq    mean  median      uq    max neval
##     multicool 2308.56 1755.8 1492.30 1696.47 1408.55 685.18   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.27    1.1    1.22    1.19    1.28   1.35   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.0    1.00    1.00    1.00   1.00   100

    K-Permutations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:5, f)
microbenchmark(
    multicool = allPerm(initMC(x)),
    RcppAlgos = permuteGeneral(5, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = permutations(k = 6, freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr     min      lq    mean  median      uq     max neval
##     multicool 3406.75 3224.51 857.726 2151.59 1907.66 19.2975   100
##     RcppAlgos    1.12    1.22   0.504    1.06    1.14  0.0944   100
##  arrangements    1.00    1.00   1.000    1.00    1.00  1.0000   100

    Combinations

    7-Combinations of 15 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(15, 7),
    combinat = combn(15, 7),
    utils = utils.combn(15, 7),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(15, 7),
    arrangements = combinations(15, 7),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq   mean median     uq    max neval
##        gtools 380.14 315.70 265.36 306.52 259.80 80.382   100
##      combinat  94.48  76.08  70.25  74.38  70.04 29.654   100
##         utils 116.86  94.67  86.33  94.17  88.39 37.501   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00   1.00  1.000   100
##  arrangements   1.08   1.06   1.05   1.07   1.03  0.843   100

    Combinations with replacement of 9 items

    microbenchmark(
    gtools = gtools.combinations(9, 6, repeats.allowed = TRUE),
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(9, 6, repetition = TRUE),
    arrangements = combinations(9, 6, replace = TRUE),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr    min     lq    mean median  uq     max neval
##        gtools 304.32 301.14 238.831 220.20 213 547.526   100
##     RcppAlgos   1.00   1.00   1.000   1.00   1   1.000   100
##  arrangements   1.06   1.06   0.992   1.02   1   0.918   100

    Combinations of multiset

    f <- c(2, 1, 2, 1, 2, 2, 1, 2)
x <- rep(1:8, f)
microbenchmark(
    RcppAlgos = comboGeneral(8, 6, freqs = f),
    arrangements = combinations(k = 6, freq = f),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq   max neval
##     RcppAlgos 1.06 1.06 1.03   1.03 1.03 0.878   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.00 1.000   100

    Partitions

    Partitions of 30

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = parts(30),
    arrangements = partitions(30),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median   uq  max neval
##    partitions 3.46 2.83  2.8   2.77 2.85 1.31   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00  1.0   1.00 1.00 1.00   100

    Partitions of 50 into 10 parts

    microbenchmark(
    partitions = restrictedparts(50, 10, include.zero = FALSE),
    arrangements = partitions(50, 10),
    unit = "relative"
)
    ## Unit: relative
##          expr  min   lq mean median  uq  max neval
##    partitions 3.67 3.78 3.33   3.79 4.2 1.71   100
##  arrangements 1.00 1.00 1.00   1.00 1.0 1.00   100
